data.title: Talent Hunt Var
data.meta_description: Talent Hunt Var - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides information about an upcoming talent show event for college students in Bangalore, India. It will feature dance, rock band, and fashion competitions with cash prizes for the winners. Auditions will be held in late August with the final event in mid-September. The event will have food, merchandise, and sponsor stalls. It will be marketed through posters, newspapers, radio, and social media. The target audiences are college students, professionals, families and the general public. Details on sponsorship opportunities and a tentative budget are also provided.
